verses.verse: And the <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> came <S%G4334><s%>, and trying <S%G3985><s%> him asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to show <S%G1925><s%> them <S%G846><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, When it is <S%G1096><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%>, ye say <S%G3004><s%>, It will be fair weather <S%G2105><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%>, It will be foul weather <S%G5494><s%> to-day <S%G4594><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> and lowering <S%G4768><s%>. Ye <S%G5273><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> how to discern <S%G1252><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G1410><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> discern the signs <S%G4592><s%> of the times <S%G2540><s%>.

An evil <S%G4190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeketh after <S%G1934><s%> a sign <S%G4592><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there shall <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> be given <S%G1325><s%> unto it <S%G1487><s%>, but <S%G3361><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Jonah <S%G2495><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G2641><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G565><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2064><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other side <S%G4008><s%> and forgot <S%G1950><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Take heed <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, We <S%G3754><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceiving <S%G1097><s%> it said <S%G2036><s%>, O ye of little faith <S%G3640><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> reason ye <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G1260><s%> have <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>?

Do ye <S%G3539><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> the <S%G740><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the five thousand <S%G4000><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> ye took up <S%G2983><s%>?

Neither <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G740><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the four thousand <S%G5070><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> how many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> ye took up <S%G2983><s%>?

How is it that <S%G4459><s%> ye do <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I spake <S%G2036><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>? But beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> understood they <S%G4920><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he bade <S%G2036><s%> them not <S%G3756><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of bread <S%G740><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%>.

Now when <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the parts <S%G3313><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi <S%G5376><s%>, he asked <S%G2065><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G3004><s%> men <S%G444><s%> say that <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3165><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G3165><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Some <S%G3303><s%> say John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>; some <S%G1161><s%>, Elijah <S%G2243><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G2087><s%>, Jeremiah <S%G2408><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%>, the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G2316><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> art thou <S%G1488><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%> Bar-jonah <S%G2495><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> hath <S%G601><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> it unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the gates <S%G4439><s%> of Hades <S%G86><s%> shall <S%G2729><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> prevail against <S%G2729><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

I <S%G2532><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt bind <S%G1210><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt loose <S%G3089><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> loosed <S%G3089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> charged he <S%G1291><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2076><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

From <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> began <S%G756><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> go <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> be raised up <S%G1453><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and began to <S%G756><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Be it far <S%G2436><s%> from thee <S%G4671><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>: this <S%G5124><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he turned <S%G4762><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto Peter <S%G4074><s%>, Get thee <S%G5217><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, Satan <S%G4567><s%>: thou art <S%G1488><s%> a stumbling-block <S%G4625><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> thou mindest <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the things of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man would <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%>, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for <S%G1752><s%> my <S%G1700><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall <S%G5623><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be profited <S%G5623><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> he shall gain <S%G2770><s%> the <S%G2889><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> forfeit <S%G2210><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall <S%G1325><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for <S%G5590><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall he render <S%G591><s%> unto every man <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G4234><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, there are <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stand <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> shall <S%G1089><s%> in no <S%G3756><s%> wise <S%G3361><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> they see <S%G1492><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%>.
